channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @Lynn_Nothegger You could also think of this as a map where the train makes more sense than flying (time-wise, not climate-wise). We use 5 hours as our guide (for us, any large German city except Stuttgart or Munich).
item.source:markdown: @Lynn_Nothegger You could also think of this as a map where the train makes more sense than flying (time-wise, not climate-wise). We use 5 hours as our guide (for us, any large German city except Stuttgart or Munich).

item.description: @cncx I‚Äôd say ‚Äúbitchmittens‚Äù is more badass than disrespectful, but I guess it depends on how the cat sees it
item.source:markdown: @cncx I‚Äôd say ‚Äúbitchmittens‚Äù is more badass than disrespectful, but I guess it depends on how the cat sees it

item.description: After 24 h travel we‚Äôre back home to our wonderful German bed with comforter instead of sheets! I‚Äôd take a picture, but my wife has already collapsed into it.
item.source:markdown: After 24 h travel we‚Äôre back home to our wonderful German bed with comforter instead of sheets! I‚Äôd take a picture, but my wife has already collapsed into it.

item.description: @Regensbloggerin @jrsofty @cliff1976 As a mixed US/EU couple, we can usually together use the US or the EU line, but with exceptions on both sides of the Atlantic. Never hurts to ask.
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin @jrsofty @cliff1976 As a mixed US/EU couple, we can usually together use the US or the EU line, but with exceptions on both sides of the Atlantic. Never hurts to ask.

item.description: @jrsofty At least at Schiphol üòÄ

item.description: Landed at AMS. Lines at passport control normal, as usual the EU line with residence card took 5 minutes https://t.co/W8zJyHjmuG
item.source:markdown: Landed at AMS. Lines at passport control normal, as usual the EU line with residence card took 5 minutes https://t.co/W8zJyHjmuG

item.description: When you give your people free rein over social media‚Ä¶ üòÄ Return traffic from the Wacken festival is our busiest day of the year on the Autobahn, we‚Äôre happy it‚Äôs back after 2 years! https://t.co/EUAmIPyRCX

item.description: @amberlough AFAIK, while the card will do for a lot of things, it‚Äôs not official ID (like for crossing borders). Only country of citizenship can issue official ID.
item.source:markdown: @amberlough AFAIK, while the card will do for a lot of things, it‚Äôs not official ID (like for crossing borders). Only country of citizenship can issue official ID.

item.description: @amberlough Border guards don‚Äôt issue passports, they just look at them! üòõ
item.source:markdown: @amberlough Border guards don‚Äôt issue passports, they just look at them! üòõ

item.description: @HejM0 Our electricity bills are currently negotiated monthly so we get those increases in real time üòÄ (market is so jumpy it makes no sense to lock in future prices, say our consultants)
item.source:markdown: @HejM0 Our electricity bills are currently negotiated monthly so we get those increases in real time üòÄ (market is so jumpy it makes no sense to lock in future prices, say our consultants)

item.description: @tessaapproves @bzbear2 @HamburgSent German waitstaff are likely covered by the collective bargaining agreement between the local DEHOGA and the union NGG. US waitstaff are likely not covered by such an agreement.
item.source:markdown: @tessaapproves @bzbear2 @HamburgSent German waitstaff are likely covered by the collective bargaining agreement between the local DEHOGA and the union NGG. US waitstaff are likely not covered by such an agreement.

item.description: Our energy consultant just told us to expect our monthly commercial natural gas payments to increase by 2-1/2 times shortly. #NordStream1
item.source:markdown: Our energy consultant just told us to expect our monthly commercial natural gas payments to increase by 2-1/2 times shortly. #NordStream1

item.description: @MCinHD Just don‚Äôt let them make you Schatzmeister:in. My wife‚Äòs been in online banking 3 times during her vacation for her Verein.
item.source:markdown: @MCinHD Just don‚Äôt let them make you Schatzmeister:in. My wife‚Äòs been in online banking 3 times during her vacation for her Verein.

item.description: @bzbear2 @lazycuttlefish @HamburgSent Not sure how my tweet about bedding devolved into a discussion of restaurant norms. I personally never tip in bed and have never been kicked out early. üòÅ

item.description: Happy to have started a, erm, wide-ranging discussion. We‚Äôre just looking forward to our German bed with a comforter instead of a topsheet. https://t.co/W5FYiNsosq

item.description: Biggest complaint I‚Äôve heard lately from German travelers in the US: American bedsheets are terrible. At this point I can‚Äôt argue.
item.source:markdown: Biggest complaint I‚Äôve heard lately from German travelers in the US: American bedsheets are terrible. At this point I can‚Äôt argue.

item.description: @HejM0 @Heather_inDE Speaking of looks (and to diverge from the topic a bit), here in the US when we describe our diverse crew we get questions on how they ‚Äúlook‚Äù from people I‚Äôd thought would know better.

item.description: @c0urtneyH Any connections or is the flight direct? Luggage problems seem to usually occur on connections. Otherwise getting to the airport early and checking in the night before worked for us.
item.source:markdown: @c0urtneyH Any connections or is the flight direct? Luggage problems seem to usually occur on connections. Otherwise getting to the airport early and checking in the night before worked for us.
